game.name: Calvin Tucker's Farm Animal Racing
game.shortDescription: Calvin Tucker’s Farm Animal Racing is a wacky, cartoonish kart game with loads of typical redneck, toilet humor, about eight wacky animals from a redneck farm.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Calvin Tucker’s Farm Animal Racing is a wacky, cartoonish kart game with loads of typical redneck, toilet humor, about eight wacky animals from a redneck farm.

reviewHighlights.text: Calvin Tucker's Farm Animal Racing is a deliberately silly, cartoon-styled kart racer developed by Team 6 Studios and published by Funbox Media Ltd th...
greatest racing game since double dash
